ygData.msgSnippet: Both books can be obtained from Marton Sayer in the cottage in the Qeynos Hills, if I remember correctly.
ygData.messageBody:
Both books can be obtained from Marton Sayer in the cottage in the Qeynos
Hills, if I remember correctly.

At 10:01 5/18/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: davidb@... (David Burkhart)
>
>You'll know things are trivial when you try to do it. You will get a message
>something to the effect of "this has become trivial...". I don't remember
>the exact words. There is also another book for smithing, dealing with
>Smithing Weapons and Armor. This is the one that explains how to make Banded
>armor. Note that currently, despite the book's name, you cannot make
>weapons. I've found the book in East Freeport. I'm not sure of all the
>locations.
>
>
>David Burkhart
